item.title: colormag-pro

item.content:encoded: #header-text-nav-wrap{padding-top:25px}body:not(.home) .breaking-news-main{margin-bottom: 40px;max-width: 100%;}html body #masthead.colormag-header-clean #header-text-nav-wrap{padding-top:17px}#masthead.colormag-header-clean .main-navigation a{font-weight:700}#header-logo-image img{margin-top:-20px}.home .breaking-news-main+.inner-wrap,.page.page-id-6 #main .inner-wrap{max-width:100%}footer#colophon .menu{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}footer#colophon .menu li{width:50%;border:none}footer .subscribe-form{border:1px solid #ccc;padding:10px 20px 5px;text-align:center}footer .subscribe-form input{margin-bottom:20px;width:100%;padding:10px}.colormag-footer--classic-bordered .footer-socket-wrapper .footer-socket-area{border:none}.breaking-news{max-width:1140px;margin:0 auto}.breaking-news-main{background:#fff;margin-top:-30px;padding-top:15px;padding-bottom:20px!important;border-bottom:1px solid #f2f3f4;border-top:1px solid #f2f3f4;padding-bottom:20px!important}@media (max-width:991px){#header-logo-image img{margin-top:0}.breaking-news{width:100%}.newsticker{position:static}}
